SEARCH
Package game.behaviours

Class StompBehaviour

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
game.behaviours.StompBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class StompBehaviour extends Action implements Behaviour
Behaviour representing the stomp action of an actor. This behaviour allows an actor to stomp and deal damage to a target player within a specified range. Additionally, there is a chance for the ground to catch fire.
Author:
Ngu Trien Luan

    • StompBehaviour

      public StompBehaviour(Player subject, int range)
      Constructor to create a StompBehaviour.
      Parameters:
      subject - the target player to stomp
      range - the range within which the actor can stomp the target

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public String execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the stomp action. The actor has a chance to either deal damage to the target or set nearby ground on fire.
      Specified by:
      execute in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor performing the stomp
      map - the map the actor is on
      Returns:
      a description of the action outcome

    • getAction

      public Action getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Determines if the actor should stomp based on the proximity of the target.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor performing the behaviour
      map - the map the actor is on
      Returns:
      the action to stomp if the target is within range, or null if no action is possible

    • menuDescription

      public String menuDescription(Actor actor)
      Returns the description of the stomp action.
      Specified by:
      menuDescription in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor performing the stomp
      Returns:
